entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
